resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106708</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106708</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Porgy and Bess: An American Voice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Porgy und Bess: Eine Amerikanische Stimme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Porgy et Bess : Une Voix Américaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porgy e Bess: Uma Voz Americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Porgy e Bess: Una Voce Americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάγρος και Bess: Μια αμερικανική φωνή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porgy y Bess: Una Voz Americana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is the companion website for a documentary tracing the history of Gershwin's opera from DuBose Heyward's novel, Porgy, in 1924 to the opera's premiere in 1935 and subsequent productions. Behind the Scenes, Meet the Artists, and A Look at the Work are among the features.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist die Begleiterweb site für einen 
Dokumentarfilm, der die Geschichte von Oper Gershwins DuBose Heywards 
vom Roman, Porgy, 1924 zur Premiere der Oper 1935 und zu den folgenden
Produktionen verfolgt. Hinter den Szenen treffen Sie die 
Künstler, und ein Blick auf die Arbeit gehören zu den Merkmalen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est le site Web de compagnon pour un documentaire 
traçant l'histoire de l'opéra de Gershwin du roman de DuBose 
Heyward, Porgy, en 1924 à la première de l'opéra en 1935 et 
aux productions ultérieures. Dans les coulisses, rencontrez les
artistes, et un regard au travail sont parmi les dispositifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é o Web site do companheiro para um documentary 
que segue o history da ópera de Gershwin da novela de DuBose Heyward,
porgy, em 1924 à premier da ópera em 1935 e às produções 
subseqüentes. Atrás das cenas, encontre-se com os artistas, e 
um olhar no trabalho é entre as características.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è il Web site del compagno per un documentary che
segue la storia dell'opera del Gershwin dal romanzo di DuBose Heyward,
porgy, in 1924 al prima dell'opera in 1935 ed alle produzioni 
successive. Dietro le scene, venga a contatto degli artisti e 
uno sguardo sul lavoro è fra le caratteristiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ο ιστοχώρος συντρόφων για ένα ντοκιμαντέρ που 
επισημαίνει την ιστορία της όπερας Gershwin από το μυθιστόρημα
DuBose Heyward, φάγρος, το 1924 στο πρεμιέρα της 
όπερας το 1935 και τις επόμενες παραγωγές. Πίσω από τις 
σκηνές, συναντήστε τους καλλιτέχνες, και ένα βλέμμα στην εργασία
είναι μεταξύ των χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es el Web site del compañero para un documentary 
que rastrea la historia de la ópera de Gershwin de la novela de 
DuBose Heyward, porgy, en 1924 a la premier de la ópera en 1935 y a 
las producciones subsecuentes. Detrás de las escenas, satisfaga
a artistas, y una mirada en el trabajo está entre las 
características.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106708</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/porgy-and-bess-an-american-voice</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
